name: .ACTION File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACTION files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: ACTION files are meant to be imported and used in Automator. To import an ACTION file into Automator, select File â†’ Import Actions... from the program's menu bar. Your Automator action will then appear in Automator's Actions library.
